word_mean: 白痴：指严重的智力迟钝

sentence.Network_en: Error message boxes stop the proceedings with idiocy and should be avoided.
sentence.Network_cn: 错误消息框愚蠢地停止进度,应该避免.

sentence.Network_en: Stealing a car and then driving it drunk was the ultimate idiocy.
sentence.Network_cn: 偷了车然后醉酒开车真是愚蠢到极点.

sentence.Network_en: It's sheer idiocy to go climbing in such bad weather.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这样恶劣的天气里去爬山简直是愚蠢到家了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (originally denoting low intelligence): from idiot, probably on the pattern of pairs such as lunatic, lunacy

entry.def: If you refer to something as idiocy, you mean that you think it is very stupid.

example.ex: ...the idiocy of continuing government subsidies for environmentally damaging activities.
example.tran: 政府对破坏环境的活动继续提供补助的愚蠢行为

example.ex: ...his gentle, ironic analysis of the idiocies of the previous regime.
example.tran: 他对前政权的愚蠢政策既温和又语带讽刺的分析

auth_sentence.content: Lastly I never said idiocy was limited to evolutionists.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lastly I never said idiocy was limited to evolutionists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lastly I never said idiocy was limited to evolutionists.

auth_sentence.content: Vang was not unprepared for this sort of idiocy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vang was not unprepared for this sort of idiocy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vang was not unprepared for this sort of idiocy.

auth_sentence.content: Julia's heart lurched, all idiocy evaporated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Julia's heart lurched, all idiocy evaporated.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intrica=intricate复杂的+cy性质,状态→n.错综复杂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: idiom[n.习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色]+atic表形容词→adj.惯用的,合乎语言习惯的
idiot[n.白痴;极蠢的人;笨蛋]+cy表名词→idiocy愚蠢
idio自己的+gloss词语,语言+ia病→自由自己懂,别人不能理解的语言

stems_affixes.value_cn: 个人签名,[组织等的]标记,签名,商标[注意与ideograph区别]
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+graph写,图→个人写的,个人[或特殊图标]图标→标记,签名,商标
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+lect说→个人说的话

stems_affixes.value_cn: 习语;成语方言;[艺术等的]风格,特色
stems_affixes.word_buile: idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+m→特殊的语言
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+syn共同,综合+crasy状态→个人特殊综合症
idio特殊的,个人的,自己的+ot人→idiot特殊的个人→白痴
